Summary: looked like a bright white dot that was still at first then it starts to rise as its rising it passes another same looking dot that dot moves when the one im looking at is rising up the one which is rising stops then starts heading my way
divs: Sighting Detailswas outside looking at the sky cause i enjoy watching the sky you never know what you might see plus im definetly a beliver in aliens alaways has intrested me even as a kid but anyways i know that some ufos have been known to have multiple lights not just one like triangle dots can be the whole ufo and before i thought it was just one light usually but im looking up in the sky start seeing this dot move before i thought it just some low star or my mind playing tricks on me but its moving straight up as its goin up goes by another dot and that dot moves a little to the left and down like to stay out the way but the one im watching keeps going up then eventually stops just like that then starts heading my way its up real high so it still just looked like a dot just going over top of me it looked like it skipped or hoped as it went over like a stone in water but not big skips then i jus watched it till i couldn see it anymore my girlfriend seen it to she dont know what is was but shes not as intrested in that type of stuff like me but i went inside for a second then came back out i looked for that other dot that moved and i looked up in the sky n i see it moving the same directon but a little more to the right then watched till i couldnt see anymore i was convinced that it was a ufo especially the first one i never seen anything move that way just straight up then stop and head my direction ill be ready and watching tonight.thank you and please let me know if anyone else seen these dots.
